finalized.description: Indicator whether the meshTenantUsageReport was finalized already or not.

name.description: A name a meshTenantUsageReport can be uniquely identified with.

lastModified.description: Date of last update to the meshTenantUsageReport.

metadata.description: Contains attributes to identify a meshTenantUsageReport.

apiVersion.description: Version of meshTenantUsageReport datatype. Matches the version provided in the `Accept` request header.

kind.description: As a common meshObject structure exists, every meshObject has a 'kind'. This is always 'meshTenantUsageReport' for this endpoint.

period.description: The period of the meshTenantUsageReport, e.g. '2022-01-06Z'.

platformTenantId.description: The platformTenantId that the meshTenantUsageReport belongs to.

platformType.description: The platformType of the platform the meshTenantUsageReport belongs to.

reportCategory.description: The reportCategory of the meshTenantUsageReport, possible options are 'BILLING' or 'ENVIRONMENTAL'.

platformFullIdentifier.description: The platformFullIdentifier of the platform the meshTenantUsageReport belongs to.

spec.description: All fields in this section describe the meshTenantUsageReport.

netAmounts.description: A list of total reported amounts separated by currency.

amount.description: The concrete amount of reported costs in the corresponding currency.

currency.description: The currency used for the corresponding amount.

baseAmount.description: The converted amount. For example, if currency is USD and baseCurrency is EUR, this will be the amount resulting from conversion from USD to EUR.

baseCurrency.description: Currency for the baseAmount. This value is either null or EUR.

from.description: At which point in time the period started (usually beginning of month).

to.description: Before which point in time the period ended (usually beginning of next month).

timeframe.description: This provides actual details about the period the meshTenantUsageReport was generated for.

workspaceIdentifier.description: The identifier of the meshWorkspace the meshTenantUsageReport belongs to. (optional)

projectIdentifier.description: The identifier of the meshProject the meshTenantUsageReport belongs to. (optional)

status.description: All fields in this section provide detailed content of the meshTenantUsageReport.
